property.name: Rules

property.value: Wayne England

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until end of turn, creatures you control gain protection from white if you control a Plains, from blue if you control an Island, from black if you control a Swamp, from red if you control a Mountain, and from green if you control a Forest.

property.value: John Avon

property.value: "A good guard is alert. A great guard is also loyal." - Benalish kennelmaster

When Sunscape Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its {2}{U} kicker, draw two cards.

Activate only as a sorcery.
